ing: 1 (32 ounce) package Market Pantryâ„¢ Frozen Garlic Herb Chicken Breasts, thawed according to package directions
des: "Grilling up a quick, delicious dinner doesn't get any easier when you start with Market Pantryâ„¢ pre-seasoned chicken breasts. Once thawed, they go right onto the hot grate and minutes later you've got garlicky, grilled chicken."
ins:
Heat grill. Grill thawed chicken breasts about 15 minutes until cooked through, turning occasionally for even cooking.
Stir Basil Mayo ingredients in small bowl until blended.
Spread buns with mayo. Add grilled chicken, lettuce and tomato. Salt and pepper to taste.
